sentence.Network_cn: 她的心灵已经变得非常肮脏.

sentence.Network_en: His body was bruised, his hands were bleeding, and his rags were all besmirched with mud.
sentence.Network_cn: 他已遍体鳞伤, 手上在流血, 一身破衣服沾满了污泥.

entry.def: If you besmirch someone or their reputation, you say that they are a bad person or that they have done something wrong, usually when this is not true.

example.ex: He has accused local people of trying to besmirch his reputation.
example.tran: 他指责当地人企图败坏他的名声。

auth_sentence.content: Their reputations had been "besmirched" by a few who had misbehaved.
auth_sentence.res_content: Their reputations had been "besmirched" by a few who had misbehaved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Their reputations had been "besmirched" by a few who had misbehaved.
